Translations.Text: ki sanbandhe tara parasparake jijnasabada karache
se'i mahasambada sanbandhe
ye bisaye tara matanaikyera madhye rayeche.
Na, tara sighra'i janate parabe.
Punasca, na, tara atisighra'i janate parabe.
Amara ki prthibitake patano-bichanarupe bana'i ni
ara pahara-parbatake khutirumpe
ara amara tomadera srsti karechi joraya-joraya
ara tomadera ghumake karechi bisrama
ara ratake karechi posakasbarupa
ara dinake karechi jibikara sansthana.
Ara tomadera upare amara baniyechi sata majabuta jinisa
ara tairi karechi ekati atyujjbala pradipa
ara jharanta-megha theke amara barsana kari pracura brsti
yena tara dbara gajate pari sasya o gachapala
ara ghanasannibista baganasamuha.
Niscaya phayasala karara dinera eka nirdharita samayakala ache
se'idina singaya phutkara de'oya habe, takhana tomara asabe dale-dale
ara akasake bidirna kara habe, sutaram ta habe bahu-daraja-bisista.
Ara paharagulo dhase parabe, phale ta habe balumaya-maricika.
Nihsandeha jahannama -- ta pratiksaya rayeche
simalanghanakaridera jan'ya pratyabartanasthala
sekhane tara abasthana karabe yuga yuga dhare.
Tara sekhane sbada grahana karabe na sitalatara, na kono paniyera
sudhu phutanta jala o himasitala paniya byatita
eka yathayatha pratidana.
Nihsandeha tara hisabera katha bhabe ni
ara amadera banisamuha pratyakhyana karechila jora pratyakhyane.
Ara saba-kichu'i -- amara ta likhitabhabe sanraksana karachi
sutaram sbada grahana karo, amara tomadera bariye debo na sasti byatita.
Dharmabhirudera jan'ya niscaya'i rayeche mahasaphalya
phalera bagana o anura
ara samabayaska phutaphute kisora
ara paripurna panapatra.
Tara sekhane khelo katha sunabe na, ara mithyakatha'o naya.
Tomara prabhura kacha theke pratiphala, -- hisabamato puraskara
mahakasamandala o prthibira ebam tadera madhye ya-kichu ache tara prabhu, parama karunamaya, tamra kache baktabya rakhara kono ksamata tara rakhe na.
Se'idina ara-ruha o phiris‌tagana sarabemdhe damrabe, parama karunamaya yake anumati debena se byatita tadera ke'u katha balate parabe na, ara se sathika katha balabe.
E'ita'i mahasatyera dina. Ata'eba ye ke'u caya se tara prabhura kache asrayasthala khumjuka.

Niscaya amara tomadera satarka karachi eka nikatabarti sasti sanbandhe, -- yedina manusa dekhate pabe tara hata dukhana ki agabariyeche, ara abisbasi byakti balabe -- ''haya amara aphasosa! Ami yadi dhulo haye yetama!’’
Bhabo pracestakaridera pracanda-pracestara katha
ara ksipragamidera tbarita egunoya
ara santaranakaridera drata santarane
ara agragamira egiye'i caleche
tarapara ghatananiyantranakaridera katha
sedina spandita habe birata spandane
parabarti ghatana take anusarana karabe'i.
Hrdaya sedina santrasta habe
tadera cokha habe abanata.
Tara balache -- ''amara ki satyi'i prathamabasthaya pratyabartita haba
yakhana amara gala-paca haddi haye yaba takhana'o?’’
Tara bale -- ''ta'i yadi haya tabe e habe sarbanasa pratyabartana.’’
Kinta eti niscaya'i habe ekati mahagarjana
takhana dekho! Tara habe jagrata.
Tomara kache musara kahini paumcheche ki
yakhana tamra prabhu tamke ahbana karechilena pabitra upatyaka'tu'oya’te
phira'a'unera kache ya'o, se niscaya'i bidroha kareche
tarapara balo -- 'tomara ki agraha ache ye tumi pabitra ha'o?’
Ami tahale tomake tomara prabhura dike paricalita karaba yena tumi bhaya karo’.’’
Tarapara tini take dekhalena ekati birata nidarsana.
Kinta se mithya aropa karala o abadhya hala.
Tarapara se cale gela pracesta calate
tarapara se jaro karala ebam ghosana karalo
ebam balalo -- ''ami'i tomadera prabhu, sarbocca.’’
Sejan'ya allah take pakara'o karalena parakalera o purbera jibanera drstanta baniye.
Nihsandeha ete bastaba siksa rayeche tara jan'ya ye bhaya kare.
Tomara ki srstite kathinatara, na mahakasa? Tini'i e-saba baniyechena.
Tini era uccata unnita karechena, ara take subin'yasta karechena
ara era ratake tini andhakaracchanna karechena, ara bera kare enechena era dibaloka.
Ara prthibi -- era pare take prasarita karechena.
Era theke tini bera karechena tara jala, ara tara caranabhumi.
Ara pahara-parbata -- tini tadera majabutabhabe basiye diyechena
tomadera jan'ya o tomadera gabadi-pasura jan'ya khadyera ayojana.
Tarapara yakhana bhisana durbipaka asabe
se'idina manusa smarana karabe yara jan'ya se pracesta caliyechila
ara bhayankara aguna drstigocara karano habe ye dekhe tara jan'ya.
Tachara tara ksetre ye simalanghana kareche
ebam duniyara jibanake'i beche niyeche
seksetre abasya bhayankara aguna, -- seta'i to basasthana.
Paksantare ye tara prabhura samane damrate bhaya kare ebam a‌tmake kamana-basana theke nibrtta rakhe
seksetre abasya jannata, -- seta'i to basasthana.
Tara ghari-ghanta samparke tomake jijnasa kare -- kakhana tara agamana habe?’’
E-sanbandhe balabara mato tomara ki ache
era carama sima rayeche tomara prabhura nikata.
Tumi to sudhu satarkakari tara jan'ya ye e-sanbandhe bhaya kare.
Yedina tara eke dekhabe sedina yena tara matra eka sandhyabela ba tara prabhatakala byatita abasthana kare ni.
Tini bhrakuti karalena ebam phire basalena
kenana ekajana andha tamra kache esechila.
Ara ki tomake bujhate debe ye se hayata pabitra hate ceyechila
Athaba se manonibesa karata, phale smarakabani tara upakare asata
ara tara ksetre ye nijeke samrd'dha bhabe
tumi to tara prati'i manoyoga dekhaccha.
Athaca tomara upare ne'i yadi se nijeke pabitra na kare.
Ara tara ksetre ye tomara kache esechila agraha niye
ara se bhaya karachila
kinta tumi tara prati abahela dekhale.
Kadaca na! Nihsandeha e eka smaraniya barta
ata'eba ye iccha kare se ta smarana rakhuka.
Sam'manita prsthaguloya
su'unnata, supabitra
lekhakadera hastaksare
sam'manita, gunannita.
Ya take akrtajna baniyeche sejan'ya manusake dhbansa kara hoka.
Ki jinisa theke take tini srsti karechena
eka sukrakita theke! Tini take srsti karechena, tarapara tini take susamanjasa karechena
tarapara tara jan'ya patha sahaja kare diyechena
tarapara tini tara mrtyu ghatana, ebam take kabarastha karena
tarapara yakhana tini ca'ibena takhana take punarjibita karabena.
Na, take tini ya adesa karechilena ta se palana kare ni.
Ata'eba manusa tara khadyera dike bhebe dekhuka
kemana ka’re amara brsti barsana kari barsanadharaya
tarapara amara matike phatiye di'i caucira ka’re
tarapara tate amara janma'i sasya
ara angura o sakasabaji
ara jalapa'i o khejura
ara ghana gachapalamaya bagana
ara phalaphasala o trnalata
tomadera jan'ya khadyabhandara o tomadera gabadi-pasura jan'ye'o.
Tarapara yedina kana-phatano a'oyaja asabe
se'idina manusa tara bha'ike chere palabe
ara tara make o tara babake
ara tara patipatnike o tara santanasantatike.
Sedina tadera madhyera pratyeka lokera'i eta byastata thakabe ye take bekheyala kare debe.
Aneka mukha se'idina habe ujjbala
hasimakha, anandamukhara
ara se'idina aneka mukha -- tadera upare dhulo-bali
kalo- amdhara tadera dheke phelabe.
Era nijera'i satyapratyakhyanakari, duskrtikari.
Yakhana surya andhakaracchanna haye yabe
Ara yakhana tarakara nisteja haye parabe
ara yakhana paharaguloke apasarana kara habe
ara yakhana purna-garbha ustidera parityaga kara habe
ara yakhana ban'ya pasudera samabeta kara habe
ara yakhana sagara-nadi phempe uthabe
ara yakhana manapranake ekatabad'dha kara habe
ara yakhana jibanta-prothita kan'yasantanake prasna kara habe
kona aparadhe take hatya kara hayechila’’
ara yakhana prsthagulo khule dhara habe
ara yakhana akasera dhakani khule phela habe
ara yakhana bhayankara aguna jbaliye tola habe
ara yakhana behesatake nikate ana habe
sattba janate parabe ki se hajira kareche.
Kaje'i na, ami saksi manachi graha-naksatradera
yara cale thake, adrsya haye yaya
ara ratrike yakhana ta bigata haye yaya
ara prabhatake yakhana ta ujjbala hate thake
nihsandeha e to hacche eka sam'manita rasulera bani
saktira adhikari, arasera adhisbarera samane adhisthita
yamke mene calate haya, ara yini bisbasabhajana.
Ara tomadera sathi to pagala nana.
Ara tini to nijeke dekhechilena spasta digante
ara tini adrsya-sanbandhe krpana nana
ara eti kono bitarita sayatanera baktabya naya.
Tomara tahale kona dike calecha
eti alabat bisbabasira jan'ya smaraniya barta bai to naya
tomadera madhyekara tara jan'ya ye sahaja-sathika pathe calate caya.
Ara bisbajagatera prabhu allah ya cana ta byatita tomara an'ya kono-kichu ca'ibe na.
Yakhana akasa bidirna habe
ara yakhana naksatrasaba biksipta habe
ara yakhana samudragulo ucchalita habe
ara yakhana kabaragulo unmocita habe
takhana pratyeke'i janate parabe se ki aga-bariyeche, ara ki se pechane phele rekheche.
Ohe manaba! Kise tomake bhuliyeche tomara mahanubhaba prabhusanbandhe
yini tomake srsti karechena, tarapara tomake suthama karechena, tarapara tomake susamanjasa karechena
ye akrtite tini ceyechena se'ibhabe tini tomake gathana karechena
Na, tomara baram sadbicarake'i mithyaropa karacha.
Athaca tomadera upare niscaya'i tattbabadhayaka rayeche
sam'manita lipikaragana
tara jane tomara ya-kichu kara.
Dharmikara niscaya thakabe anandera'i majhe
ara papacarira alabat thakabe bhayankara agune
tara ete prabesa karabe bicarera dine
ara tara era theke garahajira thakate parabe na.
Ara kise tomake bujhate debe ki se'i bicarera dina
punaraya kise tomake bojhano yabe bicarera dina ki
e se'idina yedina kono sattba kono a‌tmara jan'ye kono-kichu karara samarthya rakhabe na. Ara kartrtba se'idina habe allah‌ra'i.
Dhik prataranakaridera jan'ya
yara manusera kacha theke yakhana mepe neya takhana puro mapa caya
ara yakhana tadera mepe deya athaba tadera jan'ya ojana kare takhana kama kare.
Tara ki bhabe na ye tara'i to -- tara niscaya'i punarut'thita habe
bhisana eka dine
yedina manusara damrabe bisbajagatera prabhura samane
na, nihsandeha duskrtikaridera dalila-dastabeja to sijjinera bhetare rayeche.
Ara ki tomake bojhabe sijjina ki
spastabhabe likhita nibandhagrantha.
Dhik se'idina satyapratyakhyanakaridera prati
yara bicarera dinake mithya bhebeche
ara ke'u eke asbikara kare na kebala pratyeka simalanghanakari papistha byatita
ye, yakhana tara kache amadera banisamuha patha kara haya takhana bale -- ''adyikalera galagalpa.’’
Na, baram tara ya arjana kare calechila ta tadera hrdaye marace dhariyeche.
Na, tara nihsandeha tadera prabhura kacha theke sedina abasya'i bancita habe.
Tarapara tara niscaya bhayankara agune prabesa karabe.
Takhana tadera bala habe -- ''e'i to ta'i ya tomara mithya balate.’’
Na, nihsandeha dharmaparayanadera karmabibarani to illiyine rayeche.
Ara kemana ka’re tomake bujhano yabe illiyina ki
spastabhabe likhita nibandhagrantha
Naikatyapraptara ta dekhate pabe.
Nihsandeha dharmaparayanara to thakabe paramanande
umcu asane ceye thakabe.
Tadera ceharate tumi paricaya pabe paramanandera dipti.
Tadera pana karano habe bisud'dha paniya theke, ya mohara-mara
tara mohara hacche kasturira. Ara era jan'ye'i tabe uccakanaksira akanaksa karuka.
Ara tara sammisrana habe tasanima theke
ekati prasrabana ya theke pana kare naikatyapraptara.
Yara aparadha karata tara abasya upahasa karato tadera yara imana eneche
ara yakhana tara tadera pasa diye yeto takhana tara paraspara cokha tharato
ara yakhana tara nijedera dalera kache phire asata takhana tara phirato ullasa karate karate.
Ara yakhana tara tadera dekhata takhana balato -- ''niscaya era'i to pathabhrasta.’’
Kinta tadera to edera upare tattbabadhayaka kare pathano haya ni.
Kaje'i ajakera dine yara imana enechila tara abisbasidera prati hasahasi karabe
umcu asane ceye ceye dekhabe.
Abisbasidera ki se'i pratiphala'i de'oya ha’la na ya tara karata
yakhana akasa khandabikhanda habe
ara tara prabhura prati utkarna habe ebam kartabyarata habe
ara yakhana prthibike samatala kara habe
ara tara bhetare ya-kichu rayeche ta niksepa karabe ebam sun'yagarbha habe
phale tara prabhura prati utkarna habe ebam kartabyarata habe.
Ohe manaba! Niscaya tomara prabhura taraphe tomake pracesta calate habe bisesa udyame, tahale tumi tamra saksat pabe.
Sutaram tara ksetre yake tara nibandhagrantha tara dana hate de'oya habe
take to tabe hiseba cukiye de'oya habe sahaja hisebanikese
ara se tara sbajanadera kache phire yabe khusi haye.
Ara tara ksetre yake tara nibandhagrantha tara pithera pascat dike de'oya habe
se takhana'i dhbansera jan'ya artanada karabe
ara jbalanta agune prabesa karabe.
Nihsandeha se tara sbajanadera madhye phurtite chila.
Nihsandeha se bhebechila ye se kakhano phire asabe na.
Na, nihsandeha tara prabhu barabara tara prati drstidata.
Kinta na, ami saksi karachi suryastera raktimabha
ara ratrike o ya-kichu ta tariye neya
ara candrake yakhana se purnangata paya
yena tomara eka stara theke an'ya stare arohana karate paro.
Sutaram tadera ki hayeche ye tara imana anache na
ara yakhana tadera nikata kura'ana patha kara haya takhana tara sijada kare na
parantu yara abisbasa kare tara mithyaropa kare
athaca allah bhalo janena ya tara lukocche.
Ata'eba tadera susambada da'o marmantuda sastira
tara byatita yara imana eneche o satkaja karache, -- tadera jan'ya rayeche eka nirabacchinna pratidana.
Bhabo naksatrapunjabisista akasera katha
ara se'i angikara kara dinera katha
ara saksyadatara o yadera jan'ya saksya de'oya habe tadera katha.
Khandakagulora malikadera nipata kara hayeche
jbalani de'oya agnikunda
dekho! Tara era kinara base thakata
ara tara muminadera sange ya karata tara jan'ya tara'i saksi chila.
Ara tara edera prati birupa chila na e'i byatita ye era bisbasa karata mahasaktisali paramaprasansita allah te
yamra adhikare mahakasamandala o prthibira sarbabhauma kartrtba rayeche. Ara allah saba-kichura upare saksi rayechena.
Nihsandehe yara mumina purusa omumina naridera niryatana kare ebam tarapare phere na, tadera jan'ya tabe rayeche jahannamera sasti, ara tadera jan'ya ache dahana yantrana.
Paksantare yara imana eneche o satkarma karache tadera jan'ya rayeche baganasamuha yadera nice diye baye caleche jharanaraji. Eti'ito birata saphalya.
Nihsandehe tomara prabhura pakarano bara'i kathora.
Nihsandehe tini, tini'i srsti suru karena ebam punahsrsti karena
ara tini'i paritranakari, premamaya
sam'manita arasera adhikari
Tini ya cahena tara ekaka karmakarta.
Tomara kache ki sain'yabahinira sambada paumcheche
phira'a'unera o chamudera
bastuta yara abisbasa kareche tara mithyaropa karaya rata
kintu allah tadera pechana theke ghera'o kare rayechena.
Bastuta e hacche sam'manita kura'ana
suraksita phalake.
Bhabo akasera o ratera agantukera katha
ara ki tomake bujhate debe ke se'i ratera agantuka
ekati atyujjbala naksatra.
Pratyeka sara pakse'i -- tara upare ekajana tattbabadhayaka rayeche.
Sutaram manusa bhebe dekhuka kise theke take srsti kara hayeche.
Take srsti kara hayeche sabege-skhalita pani theke
ya nirgata haya merudanda o bukera pamjarera madhya hate.
Nihsandeha tini tara pratyabartane abasya'i ksamatabana.
Se'idina lukono saba-kichuke prakasa kara habe
takhana tara thakabe na kono ksamata o na kono sahayyakari.
Bhabo barsanonnukha akasera katha
ara prthibira katha ya bidirna haya.
Nihsandeha eti sumimansakari baktabya
ara eti kono tamasara jinisa naya.
Nihsandeha tara cala calache
ara ami'o parikalpana udbhabana karachi.
Ata'eba tumi abisbasidera abakasa da'o, tadera abakasa da'o kichuta samaya.
Mahima ghosana karo tomara sarbonnata prabhura namera
yini srsti karena, tarapara suthama karena
ara yini susamanjasa karena, tarapara patha dekhiye nena
ara yini trnalata ud‌gata karena
tarapara take sukiye pamsute baniye phelena.
Amara yathasighra tomake parabo, phale tumi bhulabe na
sudhu ya-kichu allah iccha karena ta byatita. Niscaya tini janena prakasya ebam ya gupta rayeche.
Ara amara tomara jan'ya sahaja kare deba sahajakaranera jan'ya.
Ata'eba tumi smarana kariye caloca niscaya smarana karanote suphala rayeche.
Ye bhaya kare se yathasatbara upadesa grahana karabe
kinta eti eriye calabe nehata duscaritra
ye birata agune dhoke parabe
Takhana se sekhane marabe na, ara bamcabe'o na.
Se-i yathartha saphalakama habe ye nijeke pabitra kareche
ebam tara prabhura nama smarana kare, ara namaya pare.
Na, tomara duniyara jibanake pradhan'ya da'o
athaca parakala'i besi bhala o dirghasthayi.
Nihsandeha e'isaba ache purbabarti dharmagranthe
ibrahima o musara dharmagranthe.
Tomara kache ki bihabalakara ghatanara sambada paumcheche
se'idina aneka mukha habe abanata
parisranta, abasadagrasta
prabesamana habe jbalanta agune
tadera pana karano habe phutanta phoyara theke.
Tadera jan'ya bisakta kamtagacha theke chara an'ya kono khadya thakabe na
tadera nadusanudusa banabe na ebam ksudha'o metabe na.
Se'idina aneka mukha habe santa
tadera pracestara jan'ya paritrpta
samucca udyane
sekhane tumi sunabe na kono baje katha.
Sekhane rayeche bahamana jharana
sekhane ache umcu sinhasana
ara panapatragulo hatera kache sthapita
ara takiyagulo sarisari sajano
ara galicasaba bichano.
Tara ki tabe bhebe dekhe na utera dike -- kemana kare take srsti kara hayeche
ara akasera dike -- kemana kare take tole rakha hayeche.
Ara pahara-parbatera dike -- kemana kare tadera sthapana kara hayeche
ara e'i prthibira dike -- kemana kare take prasarita kara hayeche
ata'eba upadesa diye calo, nihsandeha tumi to ekajana upadesta.
Tumi tadera upare adau adhyaksa na'o
kinta ye ke'u phire yaya o abisbasa posana kare
allah takhana take sasti debena kathinatama sastite.
Nihsandeha amadera kache'i tadera pratyabartana
atahpara amadera upare'i tadera hiseba-nikesera bhara.
Bhabo bhorabelara katha
ara dasa ratrira katha
ara jorera o bejorera katha
ara ratrira katha yakhana ta bigata haya.
Ete ki ne'i kono sapathabakya bodhasaktisampannadera jan'ya
tumi ki dekho ni tomara prabhu ki karechilena'ada bansera prati
Iramera prati yadera chila umcu gathana
yadera ksetre ogulora samatulya an'ya sahare tairi haya ni
ara chamuda-jatira prati, yara khola-prantare bisalakara pathara katato
ara phira'a'unera prati, yara chila durdharsa senadala
yara bidrohacarana karechila sahare-nagare
ara sekhane asanti bariye diyechila
se'ijan'ya tomara prabhu tadera upare henechilena sastira kasaghata.
Nihsandeha tomara prabhu to praharamance rayechena.
Sutaram manusera bela -- yakhana tara prabhu take pariksa karena, phale take sam'mana dena o take anugraha dana karena, takhana se bale -- ''amara prabhu amake sam'mana diyechena.’’
Ara yakhana tini take pariksa karena, phale tara prati tara jibanopakarana mepe-jokhe dena, takhana se bale -- ''amara prabhu amake hina karechena.’’
Na, bastuta tomara etimake sam'mana kara na
ara nihsbadera khabara dite parasparake utsahita kara na
ara tomara grasa kare phela uttaradhikara sbatba puropuri galadhahkarane
ara tomara dhanasampatti bhalabasa gabhira bhalabasaya.
Kakhana'i na! Yakhana prthibita bhenge curnabicurna haye yabe
ara tomara prabhu o phiris‌tagana asabena katare katare
ara se'idina tini jahannamake niye asabena; se'idina manusa smarana karabe, kinta e smarane tara ki kaja habe
se balabe -- ''haya amara aphasosa! Ami yadi agabaratama amara e'i jibanera jan'ya!’’
Kinta se'idina ke'u'i tamra sastira mato sasti dite parabe na
ara na parabe ke'u bamdhate tamra bamdhanera mato.
Ohe prasanta prana
tomara prabhura kache phire eso santasta haye, -- santosabhajana haye
tarapara prabesa karo amara bandadera dale
ara prabesa karo amara jannate.’’
Na, ami sapatha karachi e'i nagarera name
ara tumi baidha thakabe e'i nagarite
ara janmadatara, ara yadera tini janma diyechena.
Amara niscaya'i manusake srsti karechi sramanirbhara kare.
Se ki bhabe ye tara upare ke'u kono ksamata rakhate pare na
se bale -- ''ami pracura sampada nihsesa karechi.’’
Se ki bhabe ye take ke'u dekhate pabe na
amara ki tara jan'ya baniye di'i ni duti cokha
ara ekati jihaba o duti thomta
ara amara ki take duti patha'i dekha'i ni
kinta se urdhbagami patha dharate caya ni.
Ara kemana kare tomake bojhano yabe ki se'i urdhbagami patha
dasake mukti de'oya
athaba akalera dine khabara de'oya
nikata samparkera etimake
athaba dhuloya lutano nihsbake.
Tahale se tadera antarbhukta yara imana eneche, ara parasparake adhyabasaya abalanbane pracesta kare o eke-an'ye daya-daksinyera prayasa calaya.
Era'i hacche daksinapanthiyadera dalabhukta.
Ara yara amadera banisamuhe abisbasa posana kare tara'i hacche bamapanthiyadera dalabhukta.
Tadera upare aguna acchadita kare ra'ibe.
Bhabo suryera ara tara sakala belakara kiranera katha
ara candrera katha yakhana se tara kirana dhara kare
ara dinera katha yakhana se take ujjbalabhabe prakasa kare
ara ratera katha yakhana se take acchadita kare.
Bhabo mahakasera katha o yini take baniyechena
ara prthibira katha o yini take prasarita karechena
ara manaba‌tmara katha o yini take suthama karechena
tarapara tate abega sancara karechena tara manda kajera o tara dharmaparayanatara.
Se-i saphalata arjana karabe ye take sodhita karabe
ara se-i byartha habe ye eke pangu karabe.
Chamuda jati tadera abadhyata basata mithya balechila
yakhana tadera saba ca'ite itara lokati uthe damriyechila
takhana allah‌ra rasula tadera balechilena -- ''allah‌ra ustri, ara tara jalapanasthala.’’
Kinta tara tamke mithyabadi balalo o take hatya karala, sejan'ya tadera prabhu tadera papera jan'ye tadera upare bidhbansi aghata hanalena, phale tadera ekasamana kare dilena
Ara tini era parinamera jan'ya bhaya karena na.
Bhabo ratrira katha, yakhana ta dheke deya
ara dinera katha yakhana ta jhalamala kare
ara tamra katha yini purusa o nari srsti karechena.
Nihsandeha tomadera karmapracesta abasya bibhinna prakrtira.
Sutaram ye ke'u dana kare o dharmabhiruta abalanbana kare
ebam susthu-sundara bisaye satyanistha thake
ami sigha'i tara jan'ya tabe sahaja kare deba arama karara jan'ya.
Kinta tara ksetre ye krpanata kare o nijeke sbayansamrd'dha jnana kare
ebam susthu-sundara bisaye mithyaropa kare
tara jan'ya tabe ami acire'i sahaja kare deba kasta bhogera jan'ya.
Ara tara dhanasampada tara kono kaje asabe na yakhana se adhahpate parabe.
Nihsandeha amadera kartabya to pathanirdesa kara ca
ara nihsandeha amara'i to malika parakalera o purbakalera.
Sejan'ya tomadera sabadhana kare dicchi lelihana aguna sanbandhe
tate prabesa karabe na nitanta hatabhagya byatita
ye mithyaropa kare o phire yaya.
Ara era theke alabat dure rakha habe take ye parama dharmabhiru
ye tara dhanadelata dana kare, a‌tmasud'dhi kare
ara karo ksetre tara jan'ya emana kono anugrahasamagri ne'i yara jan'ye se pratidana dabi karate pare
tara mahimanbita prabhura prasannabadana kamana byatita.
Ara acire'i se to santosa labha karabe'i.
Bhabo purbahnera suryakiranera katha
ara ratrira katha yakhana ta andhakara chariye deya.
Tomara prabhu tomake parityaga karena ni, ebam tini asantasta'o nana.
Ara alabat parakala tomara jan'ya habe prathamikakalera ceye bhalo.
Ara sighra'i to tomara prabhu tomake dana karabena, phale tumi santasta habe.
Tini ki tomake etima abasthaya pana ni, takhana tini asraya dena
ara tini tomake pana disahara, kaje'i tini pathanirdesa dena.
Ara tini tomake pana nihsba abasthaya, sejan'ya tini samrd'dha karena.
Sutaram etimera ksetre -- tumi tabe rurha hayo na.
Ara sahayyaprarthira ksetre -- tumi tabe hamkiye diyo na.
Ara tomara prabhura anugrahera ksetre -- tumi tabe ghosana karate thako.
Amara ki tomara baksa prasasta kare di'i ni
ara amara tomara theke laghaba karechi tomara bhara
ya cepe basechila tomara pithe
ara amara tomara jan'ya unnata karechi tomara namollekha.
Ata'eba kastera sange'i to arama rayeche
niscaya kastera sange arama rayeche.
Sutaram yakhana tumi mukta hayeche takhana kathora parisrama karo
ara tomara prabhura prati tabe ekantabhabe manonibesa karo.
Bhabo dumureba, ara jalapa'iyera katha
ara sina'i parbatera katha
ara e'i nirapada nagarera katha
suniscaya amara manusake srsti karechi srestha-sundara akrtite.
Tarapara amara take parinata kari hinadera madhye hinatame
tara byatita yara imana eneche o satkaja karache, tadera jan'ya tabe rayeche badha-biratibihina pratidana.
Tabe ki ya erapare tomake bicarasanbandhe mithyaropa karate deya
allah ki bicarakadera madhye sarbasrestha bicaraka nana
tumi paro tomara prabhura name yini srsti karechena
srsti karechena manusake eka raktapinda theke.
Paro! Ara tomara prabhu mahasam'manita
yini siksa diyechena kalamera sahayye
siksa diyechena manusake ya se janato'i na.
Bastutah manusa niscaya'i simalanghana kare'i thake.
Karana se nijeke sbayansamrd'dha dekhe.
Niscaya tomara prabhura kache'i pratyabartana.
Tumi ki take dekhecha ye barana kare
ekajana bandake yakhana se namaya pare
tumi ki laksya karecha -- se satpathe rayeche ki na
athaba dharmabhiruta abalanbanera nirdesa deya kina
tumi ki dekhecha -- se mithyaropa karache o phire yacche ki na
se ki jane na ye allah abasya'i dekhate pacchena
Na, yadi se na thame tabe amara niscaya tene dharaba kapalera culera gocha
mithyacari papacari culera gocha
tahale se dakuka tara sangopangadera
amara'o sange sange dakabo durdharsa bahinike.
Na, tumi tara ajna palana karo na, baram tumi sijada karo ebam nikatabarti ha'o.
Nihsandeha amara eti abatarana karechi mahimanbita rajanite.
Ara ki tomake bujhate debe mahimanbita rajaniti ki
mahimanbita rajani hacche hajara masera ca'ite'o srestha.
Phiris‌tagana o ruh tate abatirna haya tadera prabhura anumatikrame pratiti byapara sanbandhe
santi -- phajarera udaya paryanta ta calate thakabe.
Granthadharidera madhye theke yara abisbasa posana kare ara bahukhodabadira tadera charano yacchila na yataksana na tadera kache eseche suspasta pramana
allah‌ra kacha theke ekajana rasula, tini patha karachena pabitra prsthasamuha
yate rayeche supratisthita granthasamuha.
Ara yadera granthakhana de'oya hayechila tara bibhakta haya ni yataksana na tadera kache suspasta pramana esechila.

Ara tadera adesa kara haya ni e bhinna ye tara allah‌ra upasana karabe dharme tamra prati bisud'dhacitta haye, ekanisthabhabe, ara namaya kayema karabe o yakata adaya karabe, -- ara e'iti'i supratisthita dharma.
Nihsandeha granthera anubartidera madhyera yara abisbasa posana kare ara bahukhodabadira -- jahannamera agune, ta te tara abasthana karabe. Tara'i sbayam srstajibadera madhye nikrstatama.
Paksantare yara imana eneche o satkaja karache -- tara'i khoda srstajagatera madhye sresthatama.

Tadera puraskara rayeche tadera prabhura kache -- nandanakananasamuha, tadera nica diye baye caleche jharanaraji, sekhane tara abasthana karabe cirakala. Allah tadera upare santasta ara tara santasta tamra prati. E'iti tara jan'ya ye tara prabhuke bhaya kare.
Prthibi yakhana kampita habe apana kampane
ara prthibi bera kare debe tara bojhagula
ara manusa balabe -- ''era ki hala?’’
Se'idina se barnana karabe tara kahinigulo
yena tomara prabhu take prerana diyechena.
Se'idina manusera dale-dale beriye parabe yena tadera dekhano yete pare tadera kriyakalapa.
Takhana ye ke'u eka anu-parimana satkaja kareche se ta dekhate pabe
ara ye ke'u eka anu-parimana mandakaja kareche se'o ta dekhate pabe.
Bhabo urdhbasbase dhabamanadera katha
phale yara agunera phulaki chore aghatera chote
ara yara bhore abhiyana calaya
ara tara phale yara dhulo uraya
takhana era phale sain'yadalake bheda kare yaya.
Manusa niscaya'i tara prabhura prati bara akrtajna
ara se alabat e bisaye abasya pratyaksadasa.
Ara nihsandeha se dhanasampadera mohe duranta.
Tabe ki se jane na yakhana kabaraguloya ya ache ta tola habe
ebam antare ya ache ta prakasa kara habe
nihsandeha tadera prabhu se'idina tadera sanbandhe sabisese abahita thakabena.
Mahasankata
ki se mahasankata
haya, kibhabe tomake bojhano yabe se'i mahasankata ki
se'idina manusara habe biksipta pangapalera mato
ara paharagulo haye yabe dhona pasamera mato.
Sutaram tara ksetre yara palla bhari habe
se to takhana habe santosajanaka jibanayapane.
Kinta tara ksetre yara palla habe halka
tara mata habe habiyah‌.
Haya, ki kare tomake bojhano yabe ki se'i
jbalanta aguna.
Pracuryera pratiyogita tomadera matibhrama ghataya
yataksana na tomara kabare aso.
Na! Sighra'i tomara janate parabe
abara bali, -- na, sighra'i tomara janate parabe
na, yadi tomara janate niscita jnane
tomara to bhayankara aguna dekhabe'i.
Abara bali, tomara abasya'i eti dekhabe niscita drstite.
Erapara se'idina tomadera abasya'i jijnasa kara habe abadana samparke.
Bhabo bikalabelara katha.
Nihsandeha manusa alabat lokasane pareche
tara byatita yara imana eneche o satkaja karache, ara parasparake satya abalanbanera jan'ya mantrana dicche, ebam parasparake adhyabasaya abalanbanera paramarsa dicche.
Dhik pratyeka nindakari kutsaratanakarira prati
ye dhanasampada jama karache ebam ta gunache
se bhabache ye tara dhanasampatti take amara karabe.
Kakhano na! Take abasya'i niksepa kara habe sarbanasa durghatanaya.
Ara kise tomake bojhano yabe se'i hutamah ki
ta allah‌ra hutasana, prajjbalita rayeche
ya udita hayeche hrdayera upare.
Nihsandeha eti hacche tadera carapase eka bera
sarisari khutiram bhetare.
Tumi ki dekho ni tomara prabhu kemana karechilena hasti-bahinira prati
tadera cakranta tini ki byarthataya paryabasita karena ni
ara tadera upare tini pathalena jhamke jhamke pakhira dala
yara tadera achare chila sakta-kathina patharera gaye
phale tini tadera baniye dilena kheye phela kharera mato.
Kura'isadera nirapattara jan'ya
sitakalina o grikalina bidesayatraya tadera nirapattara jan'ya.
Ata'eba tara e'i grhera prabhura upasana karuka
yini ksudhaya tadera ahara diyechena, ara bhaya-bhiti theke tadera nirapada rekhechena.
Tumi ki take dekhecha ye dharmakarmake pratyakhana kare
se to ai jana ye etimadera hamkiye deya
ara gariba-duhkhike kha'oyanora ksetre utsaha dekhaya na.
Ata'eba dhik se'isaba namaya-paruyadera prati
yara sbayam tadera namaya sanbandhe udasina
yara nijera'i hacche loka-dekhiye
ara yara nisedha kare sahayya-sahayatakarana.
Nihsandeha amara tomake pracurya diyechi.
Sutaram tomara prabhura uddesye namaya adaya karo ebam kurabani karo.
Tomara bidbesakari'i to sbayam bancita.
Balo -- ''ohe abisbasigosthi
ami take upasana kari na yake tomara upasana kara
Ara tomara'o tamra upasanakari na'o yamke ami upasana kari.
Ara ami'o tara upasanakari na'i yake tomara upasana kara.
Ara tomara'o tamra upasanakari na'o yamke ami upasana kari.
Tomadera jan'ya tomadera dharmamata ebam amara jan'ya amara dharmamata.’’
Yakhana allah‌ra sahayya o bijaya asache
ara lokedera dale-dale allah‌ra dharme prabesa karate dekhate paccha
takhana tomara prabhura prasansaya japatapa karo o tamra paritrana khomjo. Nihsandeha tini barabara pratyabartanakari.
Dhbansa hoka abu lahabera ubhaya hata, ara se-o dhbansa hoka
tara dhana-sampada o ya se arjana kareche ta tara kono kaje asabe na.
Take acire'i thele de'oya habe lelihana agune
ara tara strike'o, -- indhana bahanakarini
tara galaya thakabe karapakera khejurera amsera rasi.
Tumi balo -- ''tini allah‌, ekaka-adbitiya
allah -- parama nirbharasthala.
Tini janma dena na, ebam janma nena'o ni
ebam ke'u'i tamra samatulya hate pare na.’’
Tumi balo -- ''ami asraya ca'ichi nisibhorera prabhura kache
tini ya srsti karechena tara anista theke
ara andhakarera anista theke yakhana ta acchanna kare phele
ara gamthanite phutkarinidera anista theke
ara hinsakarira anista theke yakhana se hinsa kare.’’
Tumi bale ya'o -- ''ami asraya ca'ichi manusera prabhura kache
manusera malikera
manusera upasyera
gopane anagonakarira kumantranara anista theke
ye manusera bukera bhetare kumantrana deya
jinera athaba manusera madhye theke.’’
